author: niallp
msg: Fix for Bug 33132 (Support Servlet 2.4 methods) and Bug 17583 (Handling of Multipart request parameters).
Fixes Bug 33132 - Changed MultipartRequestWrapper to extend HttpServletRequestWrapper, which support 2.4 methods.
Fixes Bug 17583 - No longer need to "un-wrap" the MultipartRequestWrapper, since in Servlet 2.3 wrapped requests can be forwarded/included.

author: richter
msg: - Output escaping now takes Perl's UTF-8 flags into
account and will not escape UTF-8 chars anymore
generaly switch between Latin1, Latin2 and UTF-8.
(For UTF-8 this is not necessary when Perl's UTF-8
Flag is correctly set, but this is not the case
